alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson and southern Gage Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Beatrice to 3 miles south of Odell. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gust up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Holmesville around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Barneston, Virginia and Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
